name: Takomo
description:
In this game you play as Takomo, an octopus gifted with the power of projectile ink. Use his power responsibly please.

Shoot through wave after wave of hostile sea creatures such as squids, pufferfish, and seahorses.

****NO LOOT BOXES**** ʷᵒʷ

Download the game for free, and see how many waves you can crush! And don't forget to join the discord!!https://discord.gg/cRHcFX5

Music by AJ Wash https://twitter.com/HiImAJW
Devloped by me https://twitter.com/Nomppie

--Patch Notes v1.1--

  • Made Takomo faster
  • Made the wave progression more manageable
  • Made it easier to tell which powerups you can stack
